p: As shown in Figure 5, NY-r19-Gluc virus was sensitive to both TBHQ and arbidol, with an IC 50 of 3.4 μM and 0.9 μM, respectively. In contrast, PR8-Gluc virus, which possesses a group-1 HA, was inhibited by arbidol but not by TBHQ. These results indicate that the NY-r19-Gluc virus can be used to evaluate IAV antivirals.
